metadata.description: Battle-tested agents, prompts, commands, and plugins built for enterprise teams who ship code daily. Production-grade components you can actually trust in the wild.

plugins.name: engineering-orchestrator
plugins.description: Orchestrate complex software engineering tasks by coordinating specialized agents through progressive disclosure, architectural planning, and deliberate agent selection.

plugins.name: database-architect
plugins.description: Design, optimize, and evolve database schemas for production systems. Handles schema modeling, migration strategies, indexing decisions, and query performance tuning.

plugins.name: devops
plugins.description: Design, deploy, and manage DevOps pipelines and infrastructure automation. Handles CI/CD pipeline creation, infrastructure as code, monitoring setup, and automation scripting.

plugins.name: fullstack-software-engineer
plugins.description: Fullstack software engineering across frontend and backend domains. Handles API development, UI implementation, database integration, and deployment tasks.

plugins.name: prompt-engineer
plugins.description: Prompt engineering tasks including designing, optimizing, and managing AI prompts.
